panels.title: 北极星调用次数（全部线程）

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(originx_thread_polaris_nanoseconds_bucket{pid=~"$pid", tid_key=~"$tid", type="cpu", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval]))  by (container_id, tid, vmrange))
histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(originx_thread_polaris_nanoseconds_bucket{pid=~"$pid", tid_key=~"$tid", type="file", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval]))  by (container_id, tid, vmrange))
histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(originx_thread_polaris_nanoseconds_bucket{pid=~"$pid", tid_key=~"$tid", type="net", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval]))  by (container_id, tid, vmrange))
histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(originx_thread_polaris_nanoseconds_bucket{pid=~"$pid", tid_key=~"$tid", type="epoll", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval]))  by (container_id, tid, vmrange))
histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(originx_thread_polaris_nanoseconds_bucket{pid=~"$pid", tid_key=~"$tid", type="futex", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval]))  by (container_id, tid, vmrange))
histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(originx_thread_polaris_nanoseconds_bucket{pid=~"$pid", tid_key=~"$tid", type="other", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval]))  by (container_id, tid, vmrange))
histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(originx_thread_polaris_nanoseconds_bucket{pid=~"$pid", tid_key=~"$tid", type="runq", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval]))  by (container_id, tid, vmrange))

panels.title: 北极星单线程（仅限筛选单线程）

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT scope_id AS __value, 
CASE 
  WHEN c.name != '' THEN c.name
  ELSE scope_id
END AS __text
FROM data_scope 
LEFT JOIN clusters c ON scope_id  = c.id
WHERE type = 'cluster'
list.label: 集群
list.name: cluster_id
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT scope_id AS __value, 
CASE 
  WHEN c.name != '' THEN c.name
  ELSE scope_id
END AS __text
FROM data_scope 
LEFT JOIN clusters c ON scope_id  = c.id
WHERE type = 'cluster'
